amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used by the Department of Justice to enforce the criminal penalties provisions of the Bipartisan Campaign Reform Act of 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to enforce the amendments made by subtitle A of title II of Public Law 107-155.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 205 (Roll no. 737).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Pence.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 205 (Roll no. 737).
